boost::numeric::ublas::banded_adaptor

boost::numeric::ublas::banded_adaptor< M > Class Template Reference

A banded matrix adaptator: convert a any matrix into a banded matrix expression. More...

Inherits matrix_expression< banded_adaptor< M > >.

Detailed Description

template<class M>
class boost::numeric::ublas::banded_adaptor< M >

For a -dimensional matrix, the banded_adaptor will provide a banded matrix with lower and upper diagonals and and , if or then .

Storage and location are based on those of the underlying matrix. This is important because a banded_adaptor does not copy the matrix data to a new place. Therefore, modifying values in a banded_adaptor matrix will also modify the underlying matrix too.

Template Parameters:
M the type of matrix used to generate a banded matrix
